title: Are Percy Jackson and Annabeth Chase man characters in the Trials of Apollo? - Quora
tags: Percy Jackson and the Olympians (book series)

response.answer_text: No, and I’m glad they’re not. Rick’s favoured them way too much and I realised they were getting stale from the Son of Neptune and Mark of Athena- in TOA, Lester is the main character and characters who are in it include Leo, Calypso, Jason, etc, and in the last book it should be Nico and Will.
Nope, Annabeth is gone and Percy is Apollo’s helpful temporary friend, which is ironic because Apollo was Percy’s helpful temporary friend in The Titans Curse.
Percy is there in the first book of Trials Of Apollo, he helps Lester/Apollo get to camp. Whereas Annabeth has only been mentioned by Percy, she is not physically present.
